awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win.

fullplot: Richard Basehart stars as one of the most influential and one of the most reviled men in history in this probing psychological study of a man who nearly gained dominance over the entire western world--at the cost of millions of lives--Hitler.
